EmailTemplate.description: This is the email template used to explain account changes for the sales rep to make in order for a credit assessment to be done.
EmailTemplate.name: FieldSales_Recommendation
EmailTemplate.subject: Changes to Prospect Requested: {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
These changes are requested in order to cleanse the account information and process the credit assessment.
Please make the following appropriate changes promptly:
Change Name from (| {!Account.Name} |) to
Change Address 1 from (| {!Account.Address1__c} |) to
Change Address 2 from (| {!Account.Address2__c} |) to
Change City from (| {!Account.City__c} |) to
Change State from (| {!Account.State__c} |) to
Change Zip Code from (| {!Account.Zip__c} |) to
Thank you
